actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1047.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7262 to amend and extend certain Federal laws relating to housing, community and neighborhood development and preservation and related programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7262 (housing, neighborhood development, and related programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7262 to amend and extend certain Federal laws relating to housing, community and neighborhood development and preservation and related programs, and for other purposes.
